alert.note: Alert for Mercer (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 1:48PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MERCER COUNTY THROUGH 230 PM EDT... At 148 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 8 miles northwest of Coldwater, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Celina, Coldwater, Rockford, Wabash, Mendon, Chattanooga and Tama. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Residents in these areas should remain alert. If this storm becomes stronger, then a warning may be needed. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
